mapper.update:
update gas_card
card_type = #{card_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_status = #{card_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_property = #{card_property,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
release_time = #{release_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
workstation = #{workstation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
workstation_resp = #{workstation_resp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
station_receive_time = #{station_receive_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where card_no = #{card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update gas_card set card_type = #{card_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_status = #{card_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_time = #{storage_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, release_time = #{release_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workstation = #{workstation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workstation_resp = #{workstation_resp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch_no = #{batch_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, station_receive_time = #{station_receive_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where card_no = #{card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update gas_card
card_status = #{statusType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
station_receive_time = #{station_receive_time, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sysUserId = #{sysUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CAST(card_no as unsigned) > #{startID,jdbcType=INTEGER} and CAST(card_no as unsigned) < #{endID,jdbcType=INTEGER} and card_status=2
